title: Repurpose Waste
description: We take what's been thrown out — old tools, broken code, abandoned ideas — and we turn it into something stronger.

title: No Loose Ends
description: Security isn’t a feature — it’s the foundation. If it leaks, it’s broken.

title: Stay Experimental
description: Curiosity fuels our process. We’re not afraid to try, fail, remix, or prototype things that don’t yet have a name.

title: Respect the Craft
description: Engineering is creative work. Our tools are art, architecture, and artifact — and we treat them as such.
